```{r}

options(repos = "https://cloud.r-project.org")  # Set CRAN mirror
install.packages('readr')
install.packages('tidyverse')
library(tidyr)
library(dplyr)
library(leaflet)
library(plotly)
library(ggplot2)
library(forcats)

# Load datasets
matches <- read.csv("matches.csv")
team_appearances <- read.csv("team_appearances.csv")
player_appearances <- read.csv("player_appearances.csv")
goals <- read.csv("goals.csv")

# Combine datasets using common columns
combined_data <- matches %>%
  left_join(team_appearances, by = "match_id") %>%
  left_join(player_appearances, by = "match_id") %>%
  left_join(goals, by = "match_id")

View(combined_data)

# Unique question: Can we predict the outcome of football matches based on team performances and player appearances?

# Model fitting
model <- glm(result ~ goals_for + goals_against + goal_differential + win + lose + draw, data = combined_data, family = binomial)

# Summary of the model
summary(model)

```
